title: Highly sensitive sensing of CO and HF gases by monolayer CuCl
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,16284-16292
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA01519C, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Shamiala Pervaiz, M. Usman Saeed, Sehrish Khan, Bisma Asghar, Y. Saeed, Hosam O. Elansary, A. U. R. Bacha
Using a first-principles approach, the adsorption characteristics of CO and HF on a CuCl monolayer are studied with Grimme-scheme DFT-D2 for accurate description of the long-range (van der Waals) interactions.
